name: Wizard Wannabe
description:
This is a submission for the 9 Day RPG Maker RTP Game Jam #1
Assets are default RTP assets except a few recolors and the edit on the title screen.

A young man wants to be a Wizard, a ridiculous proposition for his family and the people in his village.

However with some unexpected help, he is teleported to the sea of magic, embarking on a voyage to become a Wizard.

Will he overcome the challenges and fulfill his lifelong dream?

Credits
- Made by Ted Latas
- Rpg Maker MV
- Plugins by Yanfly
